name: FULVENIR
treatmentDescriptions: Monotherapy :FulVenir is indicated for the treatment of oestrogen receptor positive, locally advanced or metastatic breast cancer in postmenopausal women:not previously treated with endocrine therapy, or with disease relapse on or after adjuvant endocrine therapy; or disease progression on endocrine therapy. Combination Therapy with Palbociclib: FulVenir is indicated for the treatment of HR-positive, human epidermal growth factor receptor 2 (HER2)-negative advanced or metastatic breast cancer in combination with palbociclib in women with disease progression after endocrine therapy.
warnings: תרופה מוגבלת לרישום ע'י רופא מומחה או הגבלה אחרת
